meta.name: mysql
meta.description: Dashboard for the telegraf input plug-in: MySQL
meta.author: influxdata

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("commands_select"), 1s) AS selects_per_second FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "server"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("com_select"), 1s) AS selects_per_second FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "server"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("commands_insert"), 1s) AS inserts_per_second, non_negative_derivative(last("commands_update"), 1s) AS updates_per_second, non_negative_derivative(last("commands_delete"), 1s) AS deletes_per_second FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "server"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("com_insert"), 1s) AS inserts_per_second, non_negative_derivative(last("com_update"), 1s) AS updates_per_second, non_negative_derivative(last("com_delete"), 1s) AS deletes_per_second FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "server"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("threads_connected"), 1s) AS cxn_per_second, non_negative_derivative(last("threads_running"), 1s) AS threads_running_per_second FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "server"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("connection_errors_max_connections"), 1s) AS cxn_errors_per_second, non_negative_derivative(last("connection_errors_internal"), 1s) AS internal_cxn_errors_per_second, non_negative_derivative(last("aborted_connects"), 1s) AS cxn_aborted_per_second FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "server"
